price: 124. Tango ndeko wa bango Hûd ayebisaki bango: Boye bozali kobanga te?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ أَخُوهُمۡ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum akhūhum hūdun alā tattaqūna
